# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="db297-102">Salvataggio dei messaggi in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="db297-103">Non è possibile salvare i messaggi di posta elettronica in Outlook.com, ma è possibile stamparli in un file PDF che è possibile salvare nel PC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="db297-104">L'utilità Microsoft Print to PDF inclusa in Windows 10 consente di stampare qualsiasi messaggio di posta elettronica direttamente in un file PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="db297-105">Selezionare il messaggio che si desidera salvare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="db297-106">Selezionare i tre punti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="db297-107">nella parte superiore del messaggio e quindi seleziona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="db297-108">**Stampa**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="db297-109">Selezionare di nuovo **stampa** e dal menu a discesa stampante selezionare **Microsoft Print su PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="db297-110">Selezionare **stampa**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="db297-111">Immettere un nome di file e quindi fare clic su **Salva**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="db297-112">**Nota:** Questo non è consigliato per i computer condivisi o pubblici, in quanto altri utenti possono accedere ai file PDF salvati nel PC e non eliminarli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="db297-113">Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere [stampa di messaggi di posta elettronica, allegati e calendari in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="db297-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
